ComicInfo.Summary:
With Agent Ivy hot on Julie's trail, the body count in Julie's wake is rising. Julie blames Ivy, Ivy blames Julie, but in their game of cat and mouse, neither suspects the rat who shadows them both!
Julie and Dillon hide out at a motel under the protection of Dan's bikers. Ivy interviews Julie husband for clues. She then contact them on their disposable phone to let them know they are in danger from the suit itself.
Outside a storm is coming and with it the stranger in the rags gets closer and with him death and destruction.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-27 14:41:03. [CVDB140826]
ComicInfo.Characters: Dillon Murphy, Ivy M. Raven, Julie Martin
